mapper.select: select distinct * from sg_blog.sys_menu where del_flag = '0' and status = '0' and parent_id = 0 and menu_type in ('M', 'C') order by parent_id, order_num

select distinct sm.* from sg_blog.sys_user_role sur left join sg_blog.sys_role_menu srm on sur.role_id = srm.role_id left join sg_blog.sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.id where sur.user_id = #{id} and sm.del_flag = '0' and sm.status = '0' and sm.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and parent_id = 0 order by sm.order_num, sm.parent_id
select m.menu_id from sg_blog.sys_role_menu m where role_id = #{id}
